name: Sepawrated
description:
"Sepawrated" is a 2D platformer game that follows the journey of two kittens, one of which is controlled by the player. The game's theme is centered around "separation" and focuses on the kittens growing up and proving that they are no longer just kittens.

The player and his sibling must 'follow their mother's paws' and must use their knowledge of what they have learned with her in order to overcome obstacles and enemies along the way.

CONTROLS: Arrow keys + Spacebar (Jump)

Link to Liluo.io:
https://liluo.io/games/1a2b5fc4-1e16-48b4-8976-375bff2e9db5
